title: ANF recovers 21 kg drugs in two operations
content:
RAWALPINDI, Aug 10 (APP):Anti-Narcotics Force (ANF) while conducting two operations managed to recover 21 kg drugs, said an ANF Headquarters spokesman here on Saturday.
He informed that 1.1 kgÂ  ice was recovered from a parcel booked for New Zealand at a courier office in Rawalpindi.
In another operation, 20 kg opium was recovered from a vehicle intercepted in the Nokundi Chagai area.
Investigations are under process to register cases against the accused, he added.
